details.summary: Validate whether Update Contact API should return error when contact's country length is greater than the permissible country length limit
details.description: Example of negative test case. As country field length cannot exceeds 35, and we are setting country having length greater than 35 and checking whether the system is returning the proper error or not.

assertions.expectedValue: field length cannot be greater than 35

content.name: John Doe
content.country: Sample country name whose length is greater than the limit
content.aboutMe: My name can be used as a placeholder name and I don't have any identity.
